A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: BY FAR THE BEST STAR WARS MOVIE! Rey and Kulos relationship are further explored and the tension only increases throughout the movie. Rian Johnson does a fantastic job at evoking and changing emotions towards characters like kylo. While bad\, his amazing work and trickery can make the audience cheer for him and be on his side. The intense\, often occurring plot twists are unpredictable and INSANE. This is the best star wars movie and one of the best films ever made.
